title: Joshua Tree National Park: Lost & Found
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Lost & Found              Lost & Found        If you misplaced any items on your visit to Joshua Tree National Park, please fill out the form below or call Lost & Found Coordinator Jeannie Campbell at 760-367-5518. Lost property reports need to include the following information: owner's name, mailing address, and telephone number; item lost, with a description including manufacturer name, model, color, and any other specifics that will help us identify your property; and the date and place where you think you may have lost the item.      Report a Lost Item                Required information
